item.description:
I know this is a bit last minute, but I can't resist scheduling a Charles River Bike Ride on a day that is supposed to be Sunny & in the 80's!!!

When: Wednesday April 7th @ 5:45pm (ride leaves at 6:00 sharp)

Where: Meet at the Lechmere Canal Park <-- Link (at the Gazebo behind the Cambridgeside Galleria) There is parking at the Galleria for a fee, and metered street parking can be found if you are lucky. Meetup Spot <-- Link

Who: Bicyclists of all kind! This will be an easy ride, along the Charles River Path. Any type of bike will be fine... just make sure it is ridable!

We will pedal along the Boston side of the path, then cross the river and head back to the starting point. This will be an easy pace, and we will aim to be done around 7:15pm (just before sunset). 95% of this ride will be on dedicated bike path. The other 5% will be crossing the 2 bridges.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have my bike & my orange messenger bag
item.name: Casual Ride Along the Charles! Temps in the 80's!!!!!
